Hello I had the idea of making a stock ssto chalenge.

required: a command pod(not a space chair)

the ssto would needs to launch from the ksc go into orbit and land back at kerbin.

the smallest launch mass wins.

can i use a kraken drive?

and use graphics mods like waterfall and restock (not restock plus) cos i cant stand the normal plumes from engines from stock

Of course you can use graphical mods

But you can‘t use kraken drives
So no glitches or anything? Am i allowed to drive a tiny rocket to the tallest peak and launch from there? Kind of like what brad whistance does in his videos?

the ssto needs to be launched from the ksc 

but if your rocket has small rover wheels then you can drive it to the top of a mountain!

You can also use heat shields as wings

You could probably use wheels and such, but they'd be counted as launch mass.
A more efficient way would be to have a reaction wheel and simply roll up the mountain
